author: MetalMaarten
post_text: March 11, 2015 at 10:12 PM#1Hi all,Does anybody know how to create a loop in a macro with a counter that increases every run of the loop?I tried to use the "with" commando for this, but can't figure out what the syntax should be.setuservar $counter = 1with $counter = 1 thru 10 do -> other commands go here <-Thanks, Maarten
title: Loop in macro
